text:
Hi,

   When I hit http://localhost I get a 404 error:

"description The requested resource (/) is not available."

   however when I hit http://localhost/index.jsp it works fine. The web.xml in
the conf directory still includes the default welcome files and the web.xml in
root does not include a welcome-file definition so this should be working. I am
somewhat suspicious this is a JDK bug as JDK 1.4.1_02 is currently in beta under
OS/2 but I need your help to track down the problem. When someone hits the root
directory, what command to you execute to check to see whether or not the
welcome-files should be used? Perhaps there is a bug in the URL implementation.
Please help me track down the problem and create a testcase for our JDK 1.4.1 team.

Thanks,
Gili
